author: cnbc.com
title: SI Financial Group, Inc. Announces Cash Dividend
text:
WILLIMANTIC, Conn., April 17, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Board of Directors of SI Financial Group, Inc. (the “Company”) (NASDAQ:SIFI) has declared a cash dividend on the Company’s outstanding shares of common stock. The dividend of $0.06 per share will be paid on May 29, 2018 to stockholders of record as of the close of business on May 7, 2018.
SI Financial Group, Inc. is the holding company for Savings Institute Bank and Trust Company. Established in 1842, the Savings Institute Bank and Trust Company is a community-oriented financial institution headquartered in Willimantic, Connecticut.
